website_summaries.verdict: Tall design in a wall-mounted faucet that includes a convenient pull-down sprayer.
pros: Uses excellent materials in the construction to ensure a long-lasting faucet
Unit rotates nicely to make the water flow convenient
Uses double O-rings in the design to guard closely against leaks
Pull-down sprayer is easy to use for rinsing dishes whenever needed
cons: Odd-looking design that some won't like
Flow rate is only 1.42 gallons per minute

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for me
customer_reviews.text: We bought the wrong product at first so that we contacted the seller and asked for help. She asked me to buy this one. You can see the picture as following. We are getting new cabinets and paint and tile backsplash. We can show you pics when that is done as well. We love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Like this new faucet.
customer_reviews.text: I like this faucet so much that I wish I could have one at home too. Love the sprayer, it reaches perfectly to our three compartment sink. Very powerful spraying and that says a lot considering how old our building/plumbing is. Easy to install and has held up over time. Need some plumber's putty/tape when installing to get any leaks worked out. Great price compared with any other retailer that we shopped around at.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small commercial kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is perfect for our small commercial kitchen. It works great. Looks great too. I was a little hesitant to purchase fearing it would be difficult to purchase o-rings etc but the after emailing the mailing company and having them respond quickly I made the purchase and I am happy with it. Although it came with an extra set of all of rings I wanted to purchase extras to have on hand just incase. I was able to do so very easily by contacting the company via email.
customer_reviews.author: Tami S.

customer_reviews.title: Water comes out
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward install, parts packed well, extra washers and o rings included, imlezon responded to my inquiry promptly
customer_reviews.author: Bvr

customer_reviews.title: Great product. High quality
customer_reviews.text: This product had everything in the kit to swap out my whole sink assembly. Didn’t have to make a single trip to the hardware store. Thank you for the great finish and great product
customer_reviews.author: Panhandle Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Laundry Sink Solution!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet seems to be a great Value and product! Time will tell of course, but the fit and finish is great out of the box..
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W.

customer_reviews.title: This really made our stainless steel commercial sink look that much better. Packaged nicely and super clean
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This really made our stainless steel commercial sink look that much better. Packaged nicely and super clean.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I feel they went above and beyond to provide excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had some issues with the hose kinking up. I reached out to the manufacturer and they responded quickly to resolve my problem. I feel they went above and beyond to provide excellent customer service, something you don't see much of today.
customer_reviews.author: Cross

customer_reviews.title: I guess that the hose was a little too short that’s all that’s important to know
customer_reviews.text: Overall good quality and had no problem putting it up very easy to install the hose was a little short I probably will have to get a longer hose so I would like to get our information on that email maybe verification
customer_reviews.author: Paul Martinez

customer_reviews.title: High quality and exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: We bought this faucet to go with our large industrial size sink. It arrived promptly and very well packaged. The company contacted us immediately and offered assistance should we need it and a tutorial for installation. It was super easy to install without the tutorial, but we did find that we needed to exchange out a few pieces in order to suit our particular sink. The company was extremely helpful and willing to help us make the necessary adjustments. In the end we got a high quality, aesthetically pleasing and perfectly suited faucet/spray system for our sink. I highly recommend this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sink faucet. It is high quality and easy to install. There are several connected parts and they should be tightened as it did not come tightened. I added teflon tape where ever possible. I did not have leaks once installed with all the joints tightened with a wrench. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Min W. Kang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I put it on a 3 compartment sink in my barn. Awesome. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Steven W Strifler

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: Product came as advertised and with extra o rings and gaskets. Easy to follow directions. Well made heavy commercial setup. Packaged in styrofoam with individual compartments so it will not be scratched. Received a follow up email to confirm that all parts were indeed in package. I will be buying future products from this seller as it was a high quality product with everything needed for installation.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Spangler

customer_reviews.title: So Badly Made it's Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Very badly machined parts. Even dangerously so. Backsplash couplings were drilled off-center. Threads on one couple so bad that no amount of plumbers tape could stop it from leaking. Worse though, the spring on the prewash hose had a jagged, pointed end that cut me deep enough to require a tetanus shot. I tried to make this thing work. I tried to believe the other, ahem, 'reviews'. But there's just too much Chinese 'craftsmanship' at work here. My advice, cough up the extra couple of hundred dollars and get something serviceable.
customer_reviews.author: Arch Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Crome and color
customer_reviews.text: I am in links was great overall very happy with the functionality of this water Spicket
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but good one.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Super easy to install too. It s very straight forward and the faucet works very well. For $80 there really is not much to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: April A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: installed easy, and i'm not a plumber. been using for months, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't find this in our local big box store. This is just right for our commercial style stainless steel sink.
customer_reviews.author: PPS

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Looking Kitchen Faucet
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of options locally, but ordered this one online because it looked really well made and for a really good price. One thing I made sure of was that there was a parts website, just in case in a few years we had to do some repairs. This helps a lot when it comes to faucets, since they are get a lot of use. It really is one of my favorite features in the kitchen...
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Halbrook

customer_reviews.title: Put this faucet in my business 3 months later I ...
customer_reviews.text: Put this faucet in my business 3 months later I got a $6 water bill because they had overestimated over the past months save me a ton on water probably paid for itself in 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nicefinish
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell but chrome finish is very good. Went together very easily.
customer_reviews.author: David Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Feels heavy, real. We have bought one and will buy more. High quality, and it does not peel. Versatile in all our needs. Equivalent to the best I can buy locally. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Pre-Rinse Spray Nozzle Began Leaking After One Year
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this faucet was great....for a year. Now the spray nozzle won't turn off. After you release the squeeze trigger, it continues spraying. Even if it returns, it doesn't return fully so it constantly drips. I've taken it apart and siliconed it with no luck at all. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Beck

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Cheap Product!! Broke after 1 Month!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS... This product is very cheap! It started Leaking everywhere after only one month of very light use! you tighten one side and it works ok then a couple of days later is leaking from somewhere else! It conveniently breaks after the refund timeline! very disappointed with this. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: BOUGHT THIS FOR A BUSY RESTAURANT
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our busy restaurant that is opened 7 days per week for approx. 17hours per day. That is how often we use it. The professional plumber installed it and he was impressed on how well made and sturdy this is. He asked where we got it and we directed him to amazon. I will update this review if we have any problems with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tfirehouse

customer_reviews.title: A Great Faucet!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this faucet a year ago & love it. We have an outdoor commercial Kitchen area & this is perfect for it! BUT, we had a surprise early hard freeze and our faucet broke due to the ice expansion. We are buying this same exact faucet & when winter is over, will reinstall it.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Gal

customer_reviews.title: Commercial grade faucet
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this faucet, love the design of it. The pressure was surprisingly very good. The sprayer is real commercial grade. It extremely sturdy and very nice quality. I would absolutely recommend this faucet to my friends. Hope this could last for many many years.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Takes getting used to but then it’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for large active kitchens.. installed at location where benefit breakfasts are being prepared.. all that are using it really like it.
customer_reviews.author: TIna Copeland

customer_reviews.title: It is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Installing it today is okay, not difficult, just follow the step-by-step instructions in the manual and it is not difficult. Very beautiful and cute faucet I like it very much It is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: jack 2013

customer_reviews.title: Great combo faucet
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to contact the company for help but after posting the review below they promptly sent me a new sprayer head that does not leak. I changed my review to 4 stars. I wish it was easier to contact them after the sale. Overall I’m quite happy now. The sprayer constantly leaks. Started right after I installed it but I let it sit in my garage so I guess I’m SOL. There’s no product support and I’m past the return deadline. Looks like a quality faucet but I wish the sprayer head didn’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Burgi

customer_reviews.title: Poorly design
customer_reviews.text: The handhelds part is not easy to maneuver. The part curved part is not long enough to be effective . 2018 remodeling NJ
customer_reviews.author: Mazio Pera

customer_reviews.title: Well designed for easy assembly and installation
customer_reviews.text: This product design really impressed me. The faucet is incredibly easy to assemble thanks to the double washer seals. It also has a nice adjustable system to allow is to fit in different sink designs. Whoever engineered this did a really nice job.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Smith

customer_reviews.title: It leaks!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a really good product, but where I had to have my inspection done I needed to run with it. The casting wasn’t that good on the main body and it does leak really bad. But this is not the fault of the product it should’ve had a better inspection, by me and the manufacture
customer_reviews.author: Leaf Call

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product - poorly built x 2
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these because of the positive reviews. I cannot imagine how these faucets got positive reviews as the first was delivered with a hole in the hose, leaking everywhere and the second started leaking after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Hose a little to short for large sink
customer_reviews.text: The product is high quality and performs quite well. I would have given it five stars except the flexible hose is very short which makes it difficult to do a good job getting into the corners or pots and pans. If you don't need a long hose (as I do), I think you 'll find this a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Tryg

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a produce house processing room. It met all code requirements and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stover

customer_reviews.title: Beutifully built
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality product for an amazingly low price. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, sturdy piece at a price lower than it is on restaurant equipment sites. The length of the sprayer is short. I'm sure it states the length in the description but I was so happy about the price I bought it withour reading through the description. It's installed and I'm happy with it; short length of the sprayer and all.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Adams

customer_reviews.title: Groceries store kitchen faucet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for for a small groceries store kitchen. They liked it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply love this faucet
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this faucet far a few months now and as you can tell from the title.I simply love it. It has been easy to keep clean. This is the best faucet I have used to date.Everyone commented on my beautiful faucet
customer_reviews.author: Sibyl A.

customer_reviews.title: This item is NOT plug n play
customer_reviews.text: The spray hose is much shorter than I had expected. This item is NOT plug and play. You will have to tape the threads and Dope them as well. Otherwise, expect a leak.
customer_reviews.author: Jackal61

customer_reviews.title: Very nice commercial style faucet and sprayer
customer_reviews.text: We installed this faucet and sprayer on a new stainless steel sink for our new canning kitchen. There was a complete set of rings and seals very well labeled, but all the connection points had them already installed - so we have a nearly complete replacement set should we ever need them. Installation was pretty easy, and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, well made
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and easy to use once you figure out the valve system. I like that you can set the temperature valves and then turn on and off the main valve so the temperature doesn’t change.
customer_reviews.author: B.F.

customer_reviews.title: working fine except for leaking hose
customer_reviews.text: working fine except for leaking hose. Need to find the website to for company to order a replacement hose or see if it still under warranty. Purchased in December 2017.
customer_reviews.author: hg

customer_reviews.title: Tis a beauty
customer_reviews.text: Almost too big for the sink, but oh boy I'm happily going to deal with this beauty. QUALITY!
customer_reviews.author: Arrow

customer_reviews.title: remake all the connections at every fitting to be sure
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice faucet, and a very nice price too. more than met my needs. I did purchase the longer spray hose later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good..
customer_reviews.text: The tap arrived well packaged and virtually ready to fit. The plumber had it fitted and working in ten minutes and it looks great too. I had to order two more taps for relatives who were keen to have the same arrangement for their homes. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bazemore

customer_reviews.title: Need to hire to install
customer_reviews.text: its work as it supposed to. I needed to hire someone to install it though.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Effect

customer_reviews.title: Nice style faucet
customer_reviews.text: Mom and Dad always said girls can do what boys can do, including putting in a faucet. I did - all by myself! This is a lovely faucet, easy to install, great sprayer, pretty and so on. I am so glad that I spent the extra money to get this one. It is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B.

customer_reviews.title: The hose have a leak or break
customer_reviews.text: The hose keep breaking after I replace twice on 2018 won’t last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Lim

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had my plumber install it for my business, and it’s night and day compared to what we had before. We did have one issue with a part coming loose but they were fast and professional to replace the product! Great service. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful industrial faucet
customer_reviews.text: I brought this several months ago for my pottery studio. It is sturdy and works without any problems. I am very thankful for it and I was very glad for the price. Extremely good quality. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding Quality... Excellent addition and final touch for our project.
customer_reviews.author: Donny McIver

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Easy to install, works well, looks nice, and meets food service requirements.
customer_reviews.author: ayhan lain

customer_reviews.title: Short spray wand but otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: The only reason it doesn’t get 5 stars is cause the spray want is too short. Everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works great but minor preference changes.
customer_reviews.text: Faucet and sprayer function well but the spring for sprayer seems a bit stiff. Hopefully it will soften over time. Also the sprayer hose arm is a little shorter than I would prefer to have adequate space to pre-rinse the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: B-MO

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Wall mount snapped off after 2 months of infrequent use. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a commercial faucet, which is a perfect fit with our large double stainless steel sink.
customer_reviews.author: Julina

customer_reviews.title: If leak get fixed it still might be a good product only time an use will tell.
customer_reviews.text: Am still in process of trying to stop water weeping on back side will be the second time that I have taken 3 bay sink off the wall to put more thread dope an retighten hoping to fix leak! Had plumber pull it apart as the faucet has cracks in it an needs to be exchanged for another faucet!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Ware

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: perfect for our small kitchen ,works great. Looks great too! Very easy to connect part to part together, definitely five star.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product easy to install spout is a little long for short sinks.
customer_reviews.author: Cj Faria

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 7 months
customer_reviews.text: The product appeared to be nice and functional at first. Less than 7 months after we purchased the faucet it sheared off at the connection to the sink in our kitchen and is no longer functional.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M. Garten

customer_reviews.title: Just finished the installation
customer_reviews.text: I am really satisfied with this product. About 20 minute installation You won't be disappointed with this faucet
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B.

customer_reviews.title: Center to center hole not 8”
customer_reviews.text: Would have been perfect except the center to center hole on the base housing is not 8”. Another reviewer mentioned that it’s actually 8 5/16”.
customer_reviews.author: JKame

customer_reviews.title: Very Impresive
customer_reviews.text: The product was universal for connecting to current plumbing and the quality is very impressive, the new faucet also cam with many replacement parts for future repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry VanderWeele

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install, looks beautiful, and is working well so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jana C Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: It looks great n works great couldn’t ask for anything else!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install came quick from Amazon , shouldve of done the unit years ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald E Prieto

customer_reviews.title: Threads and Connectors are metic
customer_reviews.text: Warning: No specifications. All the threads and connectors are metric !!! What a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry K.

customer_reviews.title: **UPDATE** We received the replacement parts and the product is ...
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** We received the replacement parts and the product is functioning 100%. I'm impressed with the seller as they followed through to make sure we received the replacement part and that it was working well. (updated from 1 star to 4 stars.) This product did not work correctly but the failure happened after the return/exchange deadline. Water was spraying all over our commercial kitchen and flooded the room. We would appreciate a change to replace the defective piece (the flexible tube leading to the sprayer). Please help us fix this issue!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Blansit

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: extremely happy with the looks, great water pressure thru sprayer and faucet, easy to install, glad for the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Bayer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Have not installed yet, but looks like a very solid product
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: not 8"
customer_reviews.text: It is not 8". It is 8 & 1/2 inch. returned instead of cutting the holes in my Stainless Steel Sink wider.
customer_reviews.author: William Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Product worked out great for us
customer_reviews.text: We needed a heavy duty and durable product for our sink. This product performed just as we needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement faucet!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this faucet in no time. Works great and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Healy

customer_reviews.title: Eccentric flange broken
customer_reviews.text: The first one broke in a year. The brass flange snapped right off
customer_reviews.author: Phils Auto Plaza

customer_reviews.title: The chrome comes off.
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple weeks use the chrome is coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as my last one but it was still good and will worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: IT Doesnt need to be this difficult i had my ...
customer_reviews.text: IT Doesnt need to be this difficult i had my my doubts when i ordered but still ordered two, now on my second trip to the parts store and still have leaks. WTF
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: This was sold as new. Parts were missing and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was sold as new. Parts were missing and fittings were damaged and it leaked around the hose upon installation.
customer_reviews.author: Shane McKinely

customer_reviews.title: The plumber has made a couple attempts but it keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: The plumber has made a couple attempts but it keeps leaking at the sprayer connection. Also, the sprayer reach is too short.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Benaglio

customer_reviews.title: Fine job for price
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong.Looks great, just like higher priced brands.My mom had one and thought it would be better then a regular faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel. w

product_meta.title: IMLEZON Commercial Wall Mount Kitchen Sink Faucet Brass Constructed Polished Chrome Pre-Rinse Device 25" Height 8" Center with Coilded Spring Pull Down Sprayer and 12" Add-on Spout
feature_bullets: WALL MOUNTED with 8 inch to 8 5/16 inch Adjustable central hole distance (please contact us if you don't know how to adjust into 8" centre hole)

We sell All the spare parts for your need: 5",8",14" short spout; 38" longer hose (Asin:B07MT7GKCZ); black pre rinser sprayer;90 degree brass elbow installation kit (Asin:B07RVB6R4J) for this commercial faucet.
Lead-free Brass construction with superior rust-resistant finish.
Double-layer anti-leaking construction(with two O-rings), it can provide enhanced leak-tightness of the faucet while increasing the service life one times.

The outlet pipe can rotate at 360 degrees. The surface of faucet is plated by chrome treatment. It make the appearance more aesthetically, and It has high hardness and better heat resistance characteristics.
Easy to install the faucet by hand, and there is no water leakage.
The flexible metal tubing can be bend back and forth over 100000 cycles. We add a stainless steel sheath on the interface between the tubing and faucet to increase the service life of the tubing.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars187 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
